message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. Take this generous offer and avoid the risk of inflation!
Alice, let's be fair. A 50/50 split ensures we both benefit. Time is money - literally!
Bob, time is money, but it's ticking faster for you. I'm being more than fair - don't let this opportunity slip away.
Alice, I'm willing to be flexible, but this needs to be mutually beneficial.  Let's settle this now before inflation eats further into the pot.
